Text.Page:
, have you ever seen a Golden Octopus?

I heard one of those tourists talking about it, and now I want to see one for myself!

But the eye-witness testimony of a trusted Fishing Association member such as yourself is just as good. How about looking into it?
You caught a Golden Octopus at Seren's Lake so the Lake Fairy can follow her dreams.

Let me guess–you want to know about the octopus right?
Believe me, I saw it.
It was as big as five barakas!
The fairies of the lake chased it away before I could come up with any more similes."Fairies of the Lake?"

What, you've never seen fairies do strange things? Anyway, I gave them a piece of candy for their efforts, and now we're best friends

If you want to talk with one, try sprinkling some Star Candy on that Starlight Lotus over there.
You don't have any Star Candy? It's a must-have for travelers!

I'll make you a deal–if you bring me a Seafood Mushroom Salad, I'll give you a Star Candy.

You got the salad!

Okay, take this Star Candy, and sprinkle it on that Starlight Lotus over there.

Did you get the salad?
You can buy the ingredients from the Fishing Supplies vendor. Most of them, any way. You'll need to do a bit of fishing as well.

Did you prepare this sweet treat?

I do love candy, but we don't get much of it underwater. Maybe if that darned Golden Octopus would leave us alone, I could start the underwater candy shop I've always dreamed of.

Say, how about you catch that Octopus for me?
You can keep the fish, and I'll reward you for your time.

You actually caught it!
Thanks to you, all my dreams are about to come true.
Here, this is your reward.

Did you get the Golden Octopus?
Tough, isn't it? Take your time.
